start.text: Two birds with one stone. Easy enough, right?
Let's just say there's a demand for people of our pedigree.
That's our number. Let's get to business.
Do not count days, do not count miles! Count only the number of enemies you've killed! Go!
We're going in with the star to our backs.

start_boss.text: I believe we'll make something of ourselves here.
The bigger the foe, the bigger the story.
I'm not in this for the money, remember. I'm here for history.

retreat.text: Whatever you do, don't waste our time.

engaged.text: This war isn't going to win itself.
We have our window! Commence attack!
We have the element of surprise! Let's act on it, ladies and gentlemen! Onward!
Kill them all so they may never come back!

need_help.text: I need every man I can get over here!

pursuing.text: Cause as much damage as you can and we'll blow this war wide open!
All units, no need to share! Everything is for the taking!
Show them our signature! Strike them out of the sky and free this land!

running.text: Gotta make sure we have an exit strategy.
Me and my soldiers don't fight losing wars.
We'll get back to it soon enough.

hull_90.text: You don't get my job that easy.
Show them what a wild pack of dogs can do!
Light them up! Burn them down!

hull_50.text: Dump countermeasures! Hit them head on!
I think we've about overstayed our welcome.
They'll tell stories about this, ladies and gents.
Only blood will pay for this contract alone.

hull_30.text: There's nothing you can offer to get me to die for a lost cause!
System by system! Inch by inch! Show them no quarter!
From what vector?! I'm bogey dope!

overload.text: They had to take this from us!

victory.text: We do understand your situation, but you know how this business goes.
What can we say? You get what you pay for.
Some people call this place "the Devil's Sandbox". So what does that mean when we're the ones playing in it, huh?

victory_boss.text: How many aces are earning their wings today, eh?
Oh, it's a good day to be a captain! Dinner's on me!
